thread.title: Education is a right, not a privilege
thread.title_full: Education is a right, not a privilege | News24

author: news24.com
title: Education is a right, not a privilege
text: Wits University is anti-black with these fees increment because most poor students are black and most black students are poor. We just want education, can we not be denied the right to education and a secured future. The university is undermining students and our government are spectating instead of helping us. NSFAS doesn't have money, so where are we to get funds. Our residences are not up to standard as it is, Wits is ripping us off of what we don't have already. This is a debt increase. We are young people and we want to study but we cannot when fees keep increasing like this. Today's protest was a success and we shall continue till we are heard.
